<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Warding Tattoo](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1000)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Tattoo" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=262" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 165 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** tattooed on the body

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Many cultures of Golarion have a tattoo to turn away harm; as such, warding tattoos often resemble whichever dangers are most common to the culture, such as a wild beast or a whirlpool in the high seas of the Shackles.

**Activate** <actions string="Reaction" /> envision;  **Frequency** once per day; **Trigger** An enemy, hazard, or the environment makes an attack against your AC, requires you to attempt a saving throw, or causes you to take damage automatically;  **Effect** Until the end of the current turn, against the triggering effect, you gain a +1 status bonus to AC and saving throws and gain resistance 2 to damage.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 5"
pfs="Standard"
>
Warding Tattoo
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 165 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 140 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 6"
pfs="Standard"
>
Warding Tattoo (Trail)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 165 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 250 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You gain resistance 2 to damage from [hazardous terrain](/Rules.aspx?ID=454) and [environmental](/Traits.aspx?ID=62) hazards at all times, which increases to 5 when the tattoo is activated.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 6"
pfs="Standard"
>
Warding Tattoo (Wave)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 165 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 220 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

In addition to the normal triggers, you can activate the tattoo when you enter an environment where you can't breathe. When you activate the tattoo, it casts [_air bubble_](/Spells.aspx?ID=5) on you, in addition to the other effects.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 7"
pfs="Standard"
>
Warding Tattoo (Fiend)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 165 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 300 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You gain resistance 2 to spells cast by [fiends](/Traits.aspx?ID=70) and magical attacks by fiends, which increases to 5 when the tattoo is activated.
name: Warding Tattoo
